io.pravega

Interface ReaderGroupManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public interface ReaderGroupManager
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable

    • Method Detail

      • withScope

        static ReaderGroupManager withScope(java.lang.String scope,
                                    java.net.URI controllerUri)
        Creates a new instance of StreamManager.
        Parameters:
        scope - The Scope string.
        controllerUri - The Controller URI.
        Returns:
        Instance of Stream Manager implementation.

      • createReaderGroup

        ReaderGroup createReaderGroup(java.lang.String groupName,
                              ReaderGroupConfig config,
                              java.util.Set<java.lang.String> streamNames)
        Creates a new ReaderGroup Readers will be able to join the group by calling ClientFactory.createReader(String, String, Serializer, ReaderConfig) . Once this is done they will start receiving events from the point defined in the config passed here. Note: This method is idempotent assuming called with the same name and config. This method may block.
        Parameters:
        groupName - The name of the group to be created.
        config - The configuration for the new ReaderGroup.
        streamNames - The name of the streams the reader will read from.
        Returns:
        Newly created ReaderGroup object

      • getReaderGroup

        ReaderGroup getReaderGroup(java.lang.String groupName)
        Returns the requested reader group.
        Parameters:
        groupName - The name of the group
        Returns:
        Reader group with the given name

      • deleteReaderGroup

        void deleteReaderGroup(ReaderGroup group)
        Deletes the provided reader group. No more operations may be performed. Resources used by this group will be freed.
        Parameters:
        group - The group to be deleted.

      • close

        void close()
        See @see java.lang.AutoCloseable#close() .
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
